title: Update contact details, footer, and wire enquiry form to Gmail

requirements.summary: Update ContactSection email, location, and response time details
acceptanceCriteria: Email displayed in ContactSection is 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' and clicking it opens the user's email client via mailto:aurafloraaf@gmail.com
Hours/availability field is replaced with text indicating response time of 24–48 hours

file_operations.description: Replace the email text with 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' wrapped in an anchor tag with href='mailto:aurafloraaf@gmail.com'. Update the studio/location text to display 'Mumbai'. Replace any hours or availability text with '24–48 hour response time' or similar wording that conveys we revert within 24–48 hours.

acceptanceCriteria: An Instagram handle '@aura._.flora_' is visible in the ContactSection
Clicking it opens https://www.instagram.com/aura._.flora_/ in a new browser tab

file_operations.description: Add an Instagram contact detail displaying '@aura._.flora_' as an anchor tag with href='https://www.instagram.com/aura._.flora_/' and target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'. Position it alongside the existing contact details (email, location, response time).

requirements.summary: Update Footer social icons and contact details
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains no Facebook or Pinterest icons or links
Footer Instagram icon links to https://www.instagram.com/aura._.flora_/ and opens in a new tab
Footer email displays 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' as a clickable mailto link
Footer hours/availability text replaced with '24–48 hour response time'

file_operations.description: Remove Facebook and Pinterest social icon links entirely, keeping only the Instagram icon. Update the Instagram link to href='https://www.instagram.com/aura._.flora_/' with target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer'. Change the email in contact info to 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' wrapped in a mailto: anchor. Update location to 'Mumbai'. Replace any hours/availability text with '24–48 hour response time'.

requirements.summary: Wire contact form to open pre-filled mailto link on submission
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form opens the user's email client with 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' as the recipient
The pre-filled email subject and body include the submitted name, email address, and message
The success confirmation message is still shown after the form is submitted

file_operations.description: Modify the form submission handler to construct a mailto: URI using the submitted name, email, and message fields. Use encodeURIComponent to safely encode the subject and body. After constructing the mailto link (e.g., 'mailto:aurafloraaf@gmail.com?subject=Enquiry from [name]&body=[message content including name, email, message]'), open it using window.location.href or window.open. Keep the existing success confirmation logic so users see feedback after submission.
